permissions.Name: Tasks.Read
permissions.Description: Read your tasks and task lists
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to read your tasks and task lists, including any shared with you. Doesn't include permission to create, delete, or update anything.

permissions.Name: Tasks.Read.All
permissions.Description: Read all users tasks and tasklist
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to read all users tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user.

permissions.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite
permissions.Description: Create, read, update, and delete your tasks and task lists
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete your tasks and task lists, including any shared with you.

permissions.Name: Group.ReadWrite.All
permissions.Description: Read and write all groups
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on your behalf.  Additionally allows the app to manage your groups and to update group content for groups you are a member of.

permissions.Name: Group.Read.All
permissions.Description: Read all groups
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on your behalf.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups you can access.

permissions.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite.All

permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all users tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user

permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete your tasks and task lists, including any shared with you.

permissions.Name: Group.ReadWrite.All
permissions.Description: Read and write all groups
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on your behalf.  Additionally allows the app to manage your groups and to update group content for groups you are a member of.

permissions.Name: Tasks.Read
permissions.Description: Read your tasks and task lists
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to read your tasks and task lists, including any shared with you. Doesn't include permission to create, delete, or update anything.

permissions.Name: Tasks.Read.All
permissions.Description: Read all users tasks and tasklist
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to read all users tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user.

permissions.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite
permissions.Description: Create, read, update, and delete your tasks and task lists
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete your tasks and task lists, including any shared with you.

permissions.Name: Group.ReadWrite.All
permissions.Description: Read and write all groups
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on your behalf.  Additionally allows the app to manage your groups and to update group content for groups you are a member of.

permissions.Name: Group.Read.All
permissions.Description: Read all groups
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on your behalf.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups you can access.

permissions.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite.All
permissions.Description: Read and write all users tasks and tasklists
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all users tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user

permissions.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite.All
permissions.Description: Read and write all users tasks and tasklists
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all users tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user
